body_html: That thread links to this one http://bugs.python.org/issue24658, which says it’s an OS bug and proposes a workaround patch that hasn’t been merged. There’s also a numpy issue thread, which links to this Torch7 commit that implements a workaround torch/DEPRECEATED-torch7-distro@40e6593
body_text: That thread links to this one http://bugs.python.org/issue24658, which says it’s an OS bug and proposes a workaround patch that hasn’t been merged. There’s also a numpy issue thread, which links to this Torch7 commit that implements a workaround torch/DEPRECEATED-torch7-distro@40e6593
body: That thread links to this one http://bugs.python.org/issue24658, which says it’s an OS bug and proposes a workaround patch that hasn’t been merged. There’s also a numpy issue thread, which links to this Torch7 commit that implements a workaround https://github.com/torch/DEPRECEATED-torch7-distro/commit/40e65934e071e452f194a9d8c0fd740131babefa
